name: Iterable Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Iterable Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Iterable API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Iterable API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add
available_options: Add (值: add) - Add user to list
Remove (值: remove) - Remove a user from a list

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the event to track
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the event to track | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: campaignId (值: None) - Attribute unsubscribe to a campaign
channelUnsubscribe (值: None) - Whether to unsubscribe email from list's associated channel - essentially a global unsubscribe

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.natural_language_description: 参数名: Identifier | 作用: Identifier to be used | (必填项)

preferUserId.name: preferUserId
preferUserId.description: Whether to create a new user if the idetifier does not exist
preferUserId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Create If Doesn't Exist | 作用: Whether to create a new user if the idetifier does not exist | 默认值: True | (必填项)

by.name: by
by.natural_language_description: 参数名: By | 作用: Identifier to be used | 默认值: email | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Unique identifier for a particular user
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular user | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email for a particular user | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.description: Identifier to be used. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Name or ID | 作用: Identifier to be used. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
